title: Cant launch the game
body: Hi, I havent played lol for like 10months, now I installed it again with the 2014 setup file, it worked, I launched it, and then my laptop turned off, and after I turned it on again, I couldnt launch the game, when I press launch nothing happens, the client turns off, I downloaded the 2016 setup file, did everything in the permissions guide, uninstalled and reinstalled many times, I repaired it too, but when i press launch still nothing happens

replies.body: I did a clean reinstall with hextech repair tool and it worked!

Make sure you're running the client as administrator as well as setting up the [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for League to be recognized as safe by your OS. If that's still not working, I wonder if something might have gone wrong during the installation process itself. In that case, go ahead and grab out [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure everything in properly installed.

well sorry to hear mate. i would try using the Hextec repair tool or maybe using a ticket. i hope you can get it working and play on the rift!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
